title: Transform marketplace into cyberpunk-themed digital product store with video previews, mega bundles, and guest checkout

requirements.text: Replace the existing color scheme with a dark cyberpunk aesthetic: dark charcoal or deep matte black background (#1a1a1a), neon blue accents (#00f3ff) for primary buttons and highlights, electric purple accents (#bd00ff) for secondary buttons and hover states, maintaining the existing deep teal, warm gold, and charcoal gray colors only for subtle gradients where appropriate

quotes: Background: Dark charcoal or deep matte black. Accents: Neon Blue (#00f3ff) and Electric Purple (#bd00ff) for buttons and highlights.

acceptanceCriteria: Background colors changed to dark charcoal/matte black throughout the application
Primary action buttons use neon blue (#00f3ff)
Secondary actions and hover states use electric purple (#bd00ff)
Color changes applied consistently across all pages and components

requirements.text: Update the hero section headline to 'Unlock Your Creative Potential: 5000+ Premium Assets for the Price of a Pizza' and subheadline to 'Instant Download. Lifetime Access. 100% Secure.' with the CTA button text changed to 'Shop All Bundles'

quotes: Headline: 'Unlock Your Creative Potential: 5000+ Premium Assets for the Price of a Pizza.' Sub-headline: 'Instant Download. Lifetime Access. 100% Secure.' CTA Button: 'Shop All Bundles.'

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the new headline with emphasis on creative potential
Subheadline includes instant download, lifetime access, and security messaging
CTA button text reads 'Shop All Bundles' and navigates to products page

requirements.text: Add a centered search bar to the navigation header with placeholder text 'Search for courses, bundles...' positioned between the logo and cart icon

quotes: Header: Logo (left), Search bar (center - 'Search for courses, bundles...'), Cart icon, 'My Account.'

acceptanceCriteria: Search bar appears in the center of the navigation header
Placeholder text reads 'Search for courses, bundles...'
Search bar integrates with existing product search functionality
Layout remains responsive on mobile devices

requirements.text: Reorganize product categories into four specific categories: 'Viral Reels Library' (AI Motivation, Luxury Lifestyle), 'Editing Suite' (LUTs, PRPRO Templates, SFX), 'Masterclass Courses' (Marketing, Coding, AI), and 'Software Tools', updating both the backend product data structure and frontend category filters

quotes: Category 1: Viral Reels Library (AI Motivation, Luxury Lifestyle). Category 2: Editing Suite (LUTs, PRPRO Templates, SFX). Category 3: Masterclass Courses (Marketing, Coding, AI). Category 4: Software Tools.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend product type includes the four new category options
Frontend category filter dropdown shows all four categories
Products can be assigned to one of the four new categories
Category badges on product cards display the updated category names

requirements.text: Add video preview support to product cards and product detail pages with auto-play on hover functionality, storing video URLs in the backend product data structure

quotes: Previews: You need video previews for reels and courses. Do not just use static images.
Left Side: Carousel with video preview of the content (auto-play on hover).

acceptanceCriteria: Backend product data structure includes a videoUrl field
Product cards display video preview when hovering over the card area
Product detail page shows video preview in a carousel that auto-plays on hover
Video elements include proper controls and fallback to static images when no video is available

requirements.text: Implement guest checkout flow that allows users to complete purchases without creating an account or logging in, removing any authentication requirements from the checkout process

quotes: No Login Checkout: Allow 'Guest Checkout.' People want to buy and get the link instantly without creating an account.

acceptanceCriteria: Users can access checkout page without authentication
Checkout form collects email for order confirmation without requiring account creation
Order confirmation page is accessible without login
No authentication prompts appear during the checkout flow

requirements.text: Create a 'Mega Bundle' section on the homepage displaying an all-in-one product bundle with prominent upsell messaging and visual emphasis, positioned between the hero section and featured products

quotes: Include a 'Mega Bundle' section on the homepage for upsells.
Bundling: The money is in the 'All-in-One' bundle.

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage includes a dedicated Mega Bundle section with eye-catching design
Section displays the bundle product with special pricing and value proposition
Backend supports bundle product type with references to included products
Section appears prominently on homepage with clear call-to-action

requirements.text: Add 'Frequently Bought Together' recommendation section to product detail pages showing complementary products with a one-click option to add the bundle to cart

quotes: Make sure your site supports 'Frequently Bought Together' or 'One-Click Upsells.'

acceptanceCriteria: Product detail page displays related products in a 'Frequently Bought Together' section
Section includes a bundled price calculation showing savings
Users can add all recommended products to cart with one click
Backend tracks product relationships for recommendations

requirements.text: Update product detail page layout to show crossed-out original price next to sale price, add trust badges for 'Secure Payment' and 'Instant Delivery', and make the add-to-cart button sticky when scrolling

quotes: Right Side: Title, Price (Crossed out original price vs. Sale price), 'Add to Cart' (Sticky button), Trust Badges (Secure Payment, Instant Delivery).

acceptanceCriteria: Product price displays with original price struck through and sale price emphasized
Trust badge icons for secure payment and instant delivery appear near the add-to-cart button
Add-to-cart button becomes sticky and remains visible when scrolling down the page
Layout maintains visual hierarchy with price and trust elements prominently displayed

requirements.text: Add a downloadUrl field to the backend product data structure and implement a digital download delivery system where completed orders provide users with download links to access their purchased digital products

quotes: Solution: Host files on Google Drive (make sure sharing is set to 'Anyone with link') or Mega.nz, then put that link in a PDF, and sell the PDF as the digital product.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend product type includes downloadUrl field for storing cloud storage links
Order confirmation page displays download links for purchased products
Download links are only accessible after successful order completion
System supports external links to Google Drive, Mega.nz, or similar cloud storage

requirements.text: Create a DMCA/Copyright page accessible from the footer with legal disclaimers stating products are for educational purposes, information about GPL licensing for software, and resell rights bundle policies

quotes: Include a clear 'DMCA / Copyright' page in your footer. State clearly: 'This software is for educational purposes.'

acceptanceCriteria: Footer includes link to DMCA/Copyright page
Page contains educational purpose disclaimer
Page explains GPL licensing for applicable software
Page describes resell rights bundle policies and legal usage terms

requirements.text: Add bullet-point product descriptions to product detail pages showing exactly what files are included in each product (e.g., file size, format, watermark status)

quotes: Description: Bullet points highlighting exactly what files are included (e.g., '100GB Data,' 'MP4 Format,' 'No Watermark').

acceptanceCriteria: Product detail page displays description as formatted bullet points
Each bullet point clearly states what is included (file size, format, quality)
Description section is visually distinct and easy to scan
Backend product data structure supports detailed description text with formatting

constraints: Do not integrate with WordPress, WooCommerce, Shopify, or any external e-commerce platforms
Do not implement actual payment gateway integrations (Razorpay, PhonePe, Stripe, PayPal) as these require external service connections not supported by the platform
Do not host or upload actual large files (courses, reels) to the application storage
Do not implement real-time WebSocket features for notifications
All payment and file hosting must be represented through UI elements and data structures only
nonGoals: Building a WordPress or Shopify integration
Implementing live payment processing with external gateways
Creating actual file storage or hosting for digital products
Building an admin dashboard for product management
Implementing user accounts or login system (guest checkout only)
